isUsingPreferredSize() - Method in class org.macroing.gdt.openrc.swing.AbsoluteLayout

J

JBufferedImagePanel - Class in org.macroing.gdt.openrc.swing
A JBufferedImagePanel draws a BufferedImage, and optionally delegates further rendering to a Consumer of a Graphics2D instance.

Constructs a new JBufferedImagePanel given a BufferedImage.

Constructs a new JBufferedImagePanel given a BufferedImage, a Consumer of Graphics2Ds and the width- and height scales.
